text_block_list.text: Not yet――――Haaaa……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I press the pause button on the 
remote, stopping the video.

Hoping it would be helpful for my 
work, I was watching videos of the 
students as they trained, but……

I played the video again. 
The thing that caught my attention was――

Occasionally, a few Uma Musume that 
were chatting away in the background 
would appear on screen.

Whooa, they're going hard today too! 
Those 2 really are amazing～!
text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
No kidding. At that level, it's hard to believe 
they're our age-……
text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
They're so cool, aren't they～? 
You see them every now and then～.
text_block_list.name: Laid-back Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
That silver-haired Uma Musume who seemed 
to have no special characteristics. 
She's what caught my attention.
Oh shoot, let's go～.
text_block_list.name: Laid-back Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
The girls started running a lap around the 
course. There didn't seem to be anything 
noteworthy about them in terms of ability.

The laid-back silver-haired girl was lagging 
behind. She was still running even while the 
others were doing cooldown stretches.
Hehe……you don't need to film this.
text_block_list.name: Laid-back Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: ……Why? Why was I so curious about her?

I had no idea. But, there was something that 
drew me to her―― I decided to go meet this Uma 
Musume in person the next day.

That Uma Musume was doing parallel running 
training, but she couldn't seem to keep up. Her 
partner kept pulling farther away.

In the end, that Uma Musume finished the run 
with nothing noteworthy happening, but――

Haa, haa……alright, I won! Just like you 
promised, you're buying the honey drinks……!
text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Geh, so you remembered……! Ummmm～, I'm still 
feeling good now so I'm gonna run another lap～!
text_block_list.name: Laid-back Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
After finishing her run, she started running 
again. Compared to before, she was running 
lighter than before. ……It was a good run!

She had finally shown such a good run too, but―― 
training was already over. There was nobody else 
here to see it.

After she had finished running, 
I decided to try approaching her.

……？ 
…………Huh、you mean me！？
text_block_list.name: Laid-back Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Are you sure you're talking to the right person? 
I'm not Hishi Amazon-chan or K.S. Miracle-chan, 
I'm Hishi Miracle you know～.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Then, she IS Hishi Miracle. I tell her that I 
don't have the wrong person and that she caught 
my attention after I saw her on video――

Video……? Oooh～, I guess I was caught on film…… 
probably? But I don't think they mentioned my 
name…… did you go out of your way to look it up～?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
choice_data_list: Yeah, and I saw your record……

text_block_list.text:
Hishi Miracle continues to lose in 
『Serious Competitions』 like Selection 
Races, Mock Races, and such.

Of course, I was worried she might be 
depressed and getting impatient, but……
Ah～, the next one will be my tenth loss!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Oh man～, I was talking with my friends about who 
would be the first to hit double digit losses, 
but at this rate, it'll be me. I'm at a loss～.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Losing 10 times was always 『Possible』 at Tracen 
Academy. But, was "I'm at a loss～" really the 
right reaction……?

Ehh～? Well, no, doesn't that just mean that's 
the limit of my ability? If there are winners, 
then there are bound to be losers～, right?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: Well～, I'm just at a loss. Alright then……
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Maybe those notes were things she noticed while 
training. If they are, then she might be an 
unexpectedly hard worker――

My English notes～. 
The next test covers a lot of material……
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
It's fine, so I'm taking a break…… 
but, seriously, it'll be bad if I 
don't do well on the next one～.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Wha-…… oh shoot, they're calling 
me～! Sorry, Trainer-san, next time, 
teach me some English please～!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Honestly, she doesn't seem like anything more 
than a normal student. Even after talking to 
her, I still don't know what drew me to her.

……But, as she runs off, I had a sudden 
realization. She had just finished parallel 
running training―
choice_data_list: She wasn't out of breath at all……

text_block_list.text:
……As I thought, her physical abilities 
seem to be quite high. I decided to 
make time and come see her again.
